title: Looking for Plat/Diamond players
body:
Hey guys

Finished S8 in plat 2 solo/duo and diamond 1 flex que

Looking for some people to play with!

I play sup jg adc all at a decent level

Hit me up keen for chill dudes looking to climb and have some fun along the way

[](http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=im%20feelin%20thresh)

Cheers

replies.body:
I am a Platinum 2 Jungle Main; Mid secondary.
https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=F1ddlesticks
I am highly available on when it comes to playing LoL.
My Champion Pool is: Fiddlesticks, Shaco and Kha'zix Jungle. Fizz and zed mid.
Please add me if you are interested in having me.

Hello, im the owner of the org, Digital fury gaming, were i manage 6+ teams while writing this with most being gold teams and one full plat team, im currently in the works to find players to make a high plat-diamond team to enter Plat-challenger comps under the name, if you want more info about the org or the team, feel free to add me in game.
